entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.4°C
